page.title: 03GYPSIES
page.content: Reputed to have been in the area for 200 years. One family has bought a narrow strip of land called a "slang" & have erected a pre-fabricated bung- alow. They have electricity & water. Another family live on a roadside verge in touring-type caravans & claim to be true Romany family. The children go to school in Brailsford. The men are scrap metal dealers or work in industry. An old grandmother, now in her 80's, whho still smokes a pipe, lives in council property in Brails- ford.The women no longer make pegs to peddle.These people live alongside local residents, & each have respect for the other,with few exceptios. The neighbouring farmers do not like the debris from the scrap metal lying about. They dont like their fields being used as lavatory and hedges and fences are damaged.
